about_the_game: This DLC unlocks the 18+ Adult Content for "Florida Love Stories". In this DLC, expect to see lesbian sex scenes that include both images of lesbian women having sexual and romantic relations and a tasty tale telling of the action!

content_descriptors.notes: The 18+ patch unlocks lesbian sex scene story and graphic content.

detailed_description: This DLC unlocks the 18+ Adult Content for "Florida Love Stories". In this DLC, expect to see lesbian sex scenes that include both images of lesbian women having sexual and romantic relations and a tasty tale telling of the action!
name: Florida Love Stories 18+ Patch
